q1: When is your goal for winning the World cup?
a1: Of course as soon as possible but it is very hard.
q2: Mexico would love to win the next world cup 2022.
a2: They need to learn from their failures this year.
q3: What failures does Mexico need to learn from?
q4: Mexico's World Cup run was fun – but it was a failure
a4: if it was fun but they did not win the championship
a5: they did it but it lacked a bit more performance
